MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH6 & EH7 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Easter Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:47am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:42am on the 12th of January 2021.
